# Create link component with correct routing (2025-09-27 03:06Z)

_**User (2025-09-27 02:52Z)**_

Create an appropraite CTA link component, which like @CTAButton.tsx has an arrow that works the exactly the same way, but is a link, underlined instead of a button, place the appropriate links linking to the correct routes in @page.tsx where the featured capabilities section links to the appropriate routes in the @product/ directory (appbuilder links to @page.tsx , chat links to @page.tsx , etc, make sure to link each one to the correct page, don't make more pages) the usecases section likewise links to pages in the @solutions/ folder

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Agent)**_

Creating a CTA link component with the same arrow animation as CTAButton, then updating the featured capabilities and use cases sections to use it.

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: app/components/CTALink.tsx</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 59, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,59 @@
- 
+ &#39;use client&#39;;
+ 
+ import { ArrowRight } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;
+ import Link from &#39;next/link&#39;;
+ import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from &#39;react&#39;;
+ 
+ interface CTALinkProps {
+   href: string;
+   text: string;
+   className?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export default function CTALink({ href, text, className = &#39;&#39; }: CTALinkProps) {
+   const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
+   const linkRef = useRef&lt;HTMLAnchorElement&gt;(null);
+ 
+   useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
+       ([entry]) =&gt; {
+         if (entry.isIntersecting) {
+           setIsVisible(true);
+         }
+       },
+       {
+         threshold: 0.1,
+         rootMargin: &#39;0px 0px -50px 0px&#39;,
+       }
+     );
+ 
+     if (linkRef.current) {
+       observer.observe(linkRef.current);
+     }
+ 
+     return () =&gt; {
+       if (linkRef.current) {
+         observer.unobserve(linkRef.current);
+       }
+     };
+   }, []);
+ 
+   const baseClasses = &#39;inline-flex items-center gap-2 underline text-accent hover:text-accent/80 transition-all duration-300&#39;;
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;Link
+       ref={linkRef}
+       href={href}
+       className={&#96;${baseClasses} ${className}&#96;}
+     &gt;
+       &lt;span&gt;{text}&lt;/span&gt;
+       &lt;ArrowRight 
+         className={&#96;w-4 h-4 transition-all duration-500 ${
+           isVisible 
+             ? &#39;opacity-100 translate-x-0&#39; 
+             : &#39;opacity-0 -translate-x-2&#39;
+         }&#96;}
+       /&gt;
+     &lt;/Link&gt;
+   );
+ }
```

</details>

</tool-use>

## Summary

Created a `CTALink` component and updated the homepage to use it.

### 1. Created `CTALink` component (`app/components/CTALink.tsx`)
- Arrow animation matches `CTAButton`
- Uses Next.js `Link` for client-side navigation
- Underlined styling with hover effects
- Intersection Observer for arrow animation
- TypeScript interfaces

### 2. Updated Featured Capabilities section
- **Real-Time Chat & Video Meetings** → `/product/chat`
- **Files & Docs** → `/product/files`
- **AppBuilder** → `/product/appbuilder`
- **Data & Dashboards** → `/product/data`

### 3. Updated Use Cases section
- **Marketing** → `/solutions/marketing`
- **Design** → `/solutions/design`
- **Software** → `/solutions/software`
- **Government** → `/solutions/government`

### Features
- Same arrow animation as `CTAButton`
- Underlined link styling with hover effects
- Intersection Observer for performance
- TypeScript support
- Responsive design
- Accessibility with proper link semantics

Links point to existing pages in the `product/` and `solutions/` directories.

---
